backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor combining authorization and blob storage, defining car price prediction types and logic, validation, and user prediction history storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature requirements to involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base style overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter metadata for the car price prediction app.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment guide detailing prerequisites, testing checklists, SEO verification, and deployment steps.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt permitting full indexing and referencing the sitemap with a crawl delay.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing the homepage with metadata for search engine indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication state, profile setup, prediction flow, and layout with React Query integration.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders an About section with project overview, founder details, and contact info using fetched data.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer with branding, contact info, social links, and founder details using fetched contact data.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with navigation, authentication controls, and scroll-based behavior.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the landing hero section with animated visuals, CTAs, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx: Implements login UI using Internet Identity with loading states and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PredictionForm.t: Form for submitting car specs to trigger price prediction with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: React form component allowing users to enter and save name and email with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Injects JSON-LD structured data for SEO into the document head on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, contact info, car price prediction, and prediction history via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions including color variables, dark mode, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including persisted URL values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing SEO-focused tasks, required assets, and feature requests for deploying a car price prediction system with Google indexing support.
